short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Cross-platform universal clipboard for myclipboard.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Clipboard allows you to copy text seamlessly between any device.

Companies such as Apple allow you to copy text seamlessly between devices made by them - for example Macs and iPhones - but not between devices outside of the ecosystem. This app is for that use case.

You can set and read your cloud synced clipboard contents using this Google Chrome extension, the iPhone App, the Android App, or the website.

Go to myclipboard.io to signup and download the other apps.
